TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteTable extends System.Object

summary.span: 存储应用程序的 URL 路由。

span.span: Stores the URL routes for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由是用于处理请求并可用于动态构造 Url 的 URL 模式。Routes are URL patterns that are used for processing requests and that can be used to construct URLs dynamically. 属性是一个`static`属性 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中), 它包含应用程序中的所有路由, 这些路由用于指定如何将 URL 请求与处理请求的类匹配。 The property is a `static` property (`Shared` in Visual Basic) that contains all the routes in an application that are used to specify how a URL request is matched to a class that handles the request. 若要指定路由, 请将路由定义添加到属性。To specify a route, you add the route definition to the property. 通常, 会在 global.asax 文件中的`Application_Start`事件的事件处理程序中添加到属性的路由。Typically, you add routes to the property from an event handler for the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file. 当 ASP.NET 应用程序处理请求时, 应用程序将循环访问属性中的路由集合, 以查找与 URL 请求的格式匹配的路由。When an ASP.NET application handles a request, the application iterates through the collection of routes in the property to find the route that matches the format of the URL request. 添加到属性中的路由顺序非常重要, 因为应用程序使用它在与 URL 匹配的集合中找到的第一个路由。The order of the routes that you add to the property is significant, because the application uses the first route that it finds in the collection that matches the URL. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将对象添加到属性。The following example shows how to add a object to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 获取从 类派生的对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that derive from the class.

value.span: 包含集合中所有路由的对象。

span.span: An object that contains all the routes in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由是用于处理请求并可用于动态构造 Url 的 URL 模式。Routes are URL patterns that are used for processing requests and that can be used to construct URLs dynamically. 属性是一个`static`属性 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中), 表示用于指定如何将 URL 请求与处理请求的类匹配的所有对象。 The property is a `static` property (`Shared` in Visual Basic) that represents all the objects that are used to specify how a URL request is matched to a class that handles the request. 若要指定路由, 请将路由定义添加到属性。To specify a route, you add the route definition to the property. 通常, 会在 global.asax 文件中的`Application_Start`事件的事件处理程序中添加到属性的路由。Typically, you add routes to the property from an event handler for the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file. 当 ASP.NET 应用程序处理请求时, 应用程序将循环访问属性中的路由集合, 以查找与 URL 请求的格式匹配的路由。When an ASP.NET application handles a request, the application iterates through the collection of routes in the property to find the route that matches the format of the URL request. 添加到属性中的路由顺序非常重要, 因为应用程序使用集合中与 URL 匹配的第一个路由。The order of the routes that you add to the property is significant, because the application uses the first route in the collection that matches the URL. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将对象添加到属性。The following example shows how to add a object to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]
